channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: The suspects in a foiled plot to attack Taylor Swift’s shows
item.description: The suspects in a foiled plot to attack Taylor Swift’s shows in Austria this month were on a mission to kill “tens of thousands” of fans before the CIA disrupted their plans.

item.title: TRAFFIC ALERT: Avoid the area of 51st and Glendale avenues
item.description: TRAFFIC ALERT: Avoid the area of 51st and Glendale avenues this morning while police investigate a deadly crash involving a bicyclist.

item.title: Need to fuel up? Here's a chance to save!
item.description: Need to fuel up? Here's a chance to save!
